code: import axios from'axios';import API_BASE_URL from'../config.js';const checkCodService=async(cod,token)=>{try{if(!token){throw new Error('No token available');}const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/check-cod/?cod=").concat(cod),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;}catch(error){throw new Error(error);}};export default checkCodService;
